sentences.sContent: The yard was lit by three huge spotlights.
sentences.sCn: 院子里亮着三盏巨大的聚光灯。

synos.tran: [电]聚光灯；反光灯；公众注意的中心

phrases.pCn: 处于公众注意的中心；出风头

trans.tranCn: 聚光灯；反光灯；公众注意的中心
trans.tranOther: a light with a very bright beam which can be directed at someone or something. Spotlights are often used to light a stage when actors or singers are performing
to shine a strong beam of light on something
